price: 28.Nabiyow yeexegen marah koo maruubinnino sinaamah inkih koo rubne nee akke waytek, moominiin maqaanê galtól ayti-kumusak, kaadu koros Yallih digaalák meesiisak. Kinnih immay maggo mari cakki mayaaxiga.
arabic: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ إِلَّا كَآفَّةٗ لِّلنَّاسِ بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā arsalnāka illā kāffatan lilnnāsi bashīran wanadhīran walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
